title: How to Load and Use a Grease Gun

steps.title: Remove the head of the gun from its barrel.
steps.content: Remove the head of the gun from its barrel.

steps.title: Pull the rod handle back.
steps.content: Pull the rod handle back. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Lock the rod handle.
steps.content: Lock the rod handle.

steps.title: Open the new grease cartridge.
steps.content: Open the new grease cartridge.

steps.title: Insert the new grease cartridge into the barrel of the gun.
steps.content: Insert the new grease cartridge into the barrel of the gun.

steps.title: Note the pull-tag on the end of the new cartridge.
steps.content: Note the pull-tag on the end of the new cartridge.

steps.title: Ensure that cartridge is pushed in enough so that the rim is in contact with the rim of the grease gun.
steps.content: Ensure that cartridge is pushed in enough so that the rim is in contact with the rim of the grease gun.

steps.title: Reinstall the barrel to the end cap but keep it loose.
steps.content: Reinstall the barrel to the end cap but keep it loose.

steps.title: Release the rod handle by turning it out from the retaining groove in the end cap.
steps.content: Release the rod handle by turning it out from the retaining groove in the end cap.

steps.title: Depress the rod handle; this will force grease into the head of the grease gun and force air out.
steps.content: Depress the rod handle; this will force grease into the head of the grease gun and force air out.

steps.title: Pump some grease through the nozzle and wipe it clean before attaching the nozzle to the gun.
steps.content: Pump some grease through the nozzle and wipe it clean before attaching the nozzle to the gun.

steps.title: Tighten the cap and push down on the air bleeder to force out the rest of the air.
steps.content: Tighten the cap and push down on the air bleeder to force out the rest of the air.

steps.title: Place the grease gun coupler at the end of the extension hose directly on the area to be greased.
steps.content: Place the grease gun coupler at the end of the extension hose directly on the area to be greased.

steps.title: Pump the lever handle enough times for grease to begin flowing.
steps.content: Pump the lever handle enough times for grease to begin flowing.

steps.title: Remove the head from the barrel as above.
steps.content: Remove the head from the barrel as above. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put a large amount of grease in the head and pack firmly.
steps.content: Put a large amount of grease in the head and pack firmly.

steps.title: Position the barrel of the gun over a tub of grease.
steps.content: Position the barrel of the gun over a tub of grease.

steps.title: Insert the barrel down about 2 inches (5.1 cm) into the grease.
steps.content: Insert the barrel down about 2 inches (5.1 cm) into the grease.

steps.title: Push down on the barrel while pulling up on the plunger or rod handle.
steps.content: Push down on the barrel while pulling up on the plunger or rod handle.

steps.title: Lock the rod handle when it is fully extended.
steps.content: Lock the rod handle when it is fully extended.

steps.title: Move the gun barrel from side to side to cut off the extra grease after the barrel is full.
steps.content: Move the gun barrel from side to side to cut off the extra grease after the barrel is full.

steps.title: Clean off all parts with stiff paper, paper towel or rag.
steps.content: Clean off all parts with stiff paper, paper towel or rag.

steps.title: Attach the gun barrel to the rest of the unit.
steps.content: Attach the gun barrel to the rest of the unit.

steps.title: Unlock the rod handle.
steps.content: Unlock the rod handle.

steps.title: Pump the grease gun handle to start the flow of grease.
steps.content: Pump the grease gun handle to start the flow of grease.

steps.title: Place the grease gun coupler at the end of the extension hose directly on the area to be greased.
steps.content: Place the grease gun coupler at the end of the extension hose directly on the area to be greased.
